SELECT COUNT(PROD_L_CODE) FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compNm}
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY >= 50
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY < 50 AND PROD_L_QUANTITY > 0
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY = 0
AND ${columnNm} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%')

SELECT OB.NUM as ordNum ,OL.ORD_L_USER as ordLUser ,OL.ORD_L_CODE as ordLCode ,OL.ORD_L_QUANTITY as ordLQuantity
,OL.ORD_L_DATE as ordLDate ,OL.ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS as ordDeliveryStatus ,OB.ORD_FINALPRICE as ordFinalprice FROM ORDER_LIST as OL JOIN ORDER_BOARD as OB ON (OL.ORD_L_USER = OB.ORD_USER) WHERE OL.ORD_L_CODE IN (SELECT PROD_L_CODE FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compNm}) AND OL.ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS = "1"
